metadata.name: Unbox 5 Companions
metadata.description: How can you see a box and not know what's inside!? Even more exciting if there are 5 boxes! All Companions are unique, but some are rarer than others. Reveal yours right away, by buying this super bundle of 5 blind boxes. Save on the purchase price, save on gas fees. Take it easy: they are all super cool. Feed your Companions, battle, and live amazing adventures in The Nemesis platform with your avatar's best friends!
